Body:
assert check_if_eline_is_activated(eline, incident_energy
    ) == success, f'Activation status for the emission line {eline} at {incident_energy} keV is {success}'
pytest.mark.parametrize('eline, incident_energy, success', [('Fe_K', 8.0, 
    True), ('Fe_K', 6.0, False), ('W_L', 12.0, True), ('W_L', 8.0, False),
    ('Ta_M', 2.0, True), ('Ta_M', 1.0, False)])
